Notes: 9Be+ atomic ion qubits. Distillation: Two noisy entangled pairs were created and distilled into one higher-fidelity pair available for further use. Unpurified fidelity of 0.614 +- 0.0015, and a purified fidelity of 0.629 +- 0.0015
